Container.Name: Xeoma
Container.Description: This is a Docker container for running Xeoma (http://felenasoft.com/xeoma/en/), surveillance software developed by Felena Soft. It supports a wide range of security cameras, has low CPU overhead, and a very easy-to-use interface. The container is just for the server, and does not have a user interface. Run the client on any computer and connect to the server on port 8090.[br][br] For additional usage information, visit [b]https://hub.docker.com/r/coppit/xeoma/[/b].
Container.Overview: Xeoma is surveillance software. Connect your cameras and record any detected movement.
